headline: Allegion Schedules Conference Call, Webcast to Announce 2025 Second-Quarter Results
summary: DUBLIN, July 11, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, will release its 2025 second-quarter financial results on Thursday, July 24, before the market opens.
